Detailed Description

Defines a column that can be edited with either a textbox, multi-line text field or a password field.

This is mostly a refined child of the BoundColumn class which allows you to specify what type of editor to use. The BoundColumn is equal to the TextColumn with its TextMode property set to SingleLine.
